Dialogue.Page: (ESKER_START_1) Hey-hey! So we are going at home, right?

DialogueOption.Text: (ESKER_START_2) Wait, what? How did you know?
(ESKER_START_3) Yes! I need you to celebrate Christmas. Let's go! (IF SHIP IS CLOSE ENOUGH AND NOT DESTROYED)
(ESKER_START_4) Yes, but don't go anywhere, I need to take ship closer. (IF SHIP IS NOT CLOSE ENOUGH)
(ESKER_START_5) I'm sorry, Esker, but it seems like my ship is not working anymore. Sorry. (IF SHIP IS DESTROYED)

Dialogue.Page: (ESKER_START_6) Well.. I use signalscope a lot. I just heard your dialogue with Slate.

DialogueOption.Text: (ESKER_START_7) Oh, I see... You got me scared sometimes, Esker.

Dialogue.Page: (ESKER_START_10) So... what's next? Are we going home?

Dialogue.Page: (ESKER_START_9) No celebration then? Sad... We can still sit here with campfire, you know..
